pages.text: $(item)Silver tools$() are simple upgrade to $(item)Iron tools$(). $(br)They are crafted using a $(item)Smithing Table$(). While still having most of Iron's qualities, Silver tools inherit abilities from $(item)gold tools$().$(br2)They are all great defense against $(marked)unholy entities$().
$(item)Silver Arrows$() can be shot just like normal arrows, applying additional damage as Silver would.
